description: A React based browser game. I grew up playing Chrono Trigger so it was a lot of fun to tinker with React and some of my all time favorite game sprites!

Yet another React based browser game! To be clear: I'm not that egotistical - my team came up with the name!!! Lol. We wanted to try our hand at developing something with a little more in the way of game logic and dynamics (also had some pretty artwork in this one).
